description.diamond-pearl:
The user looses a
blast of aura power
from deep within its
body. This move is
certain to hit.
description.platinum:
The user looses a
blast of aura power
from deep within its
body. This move is
certain to hit.

The user looses a
blast of aura power
from deep within its
body. This move is
certain to hit.
description.black-white:
The user looses a blast of aura power
from deep within its body at the target.
This move is certain to hit.

description.x-y:
The user lets loose a blast of aura power
from deep within its body at the target.
This attack never misses.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
